page.title: 07A BARNARD CASTLE FACTORY
page.content: Glaxo is Britain's biggest pharmaceu- -tical company.The Barnard Castle factory opened in 1964 and is the town's largest employer with a staff of 4500,half women.It was built to make penicillin and did this until 1976,when it changed to making tablets ,injectable products,creams, lotions and packaging Glaxo's products .The factory has been extended three times since 1970.Now a new store is being built and more staff employed.My father works at Glaxo.He starts at 8am and finishes at 5pm.He works in a department called Injections and Tropicals.In this dept they make sterile injections for use in hospitals,cream for use in tropical areas,and ointment.Glaxo also have a very good Sports and Social club and anyone can apply to become a member, even if they dont work there.
